title: Finding the maximum value of three using MAX

content.question: Which of the following expressions will produce the desired result in every case?

choices.label: Max, open parenthesis, a comma b, close parenthesis, comma, c, close parenthesis
Max, open parenthesis, a comma b, close parenthesis, minus Max, open parenthesis, b comma c, close parenthesis
Max, open parenthesis, a comma b, close parenthesis, plus Max, open parenthesis b comma c, close parenthesis, minus Max, open parenthesis, a comma c, close parenthesis
Max, open parenthesis, a comma b, close parenthesis, plus Max, open parenthesis, b comma c, close parenthesis, close parenthesis, slash 2

content.answer: Max, open parenthesis, a comma b, close parenthesis, comma, c, close parenthesis

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Use abstraction to manage complexity in a program.
